import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import plotly.express as px
import seaborn as sns

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings('ignore')

plt.figure(figsize=(12,10))
plt.subplot(3,3,1)
plt.boxplot(df['acousticness'])
plt.title('Acousticness')
plt.subplot(3,3,2)
plt.boxplot(df['danceability'])
plt.title('Danceability')
plt.subplot(3,3,3)
plt.boxplot(df['energy'])
plt.title('Energy')
plt.subplot(3,3,4)
plt.boxplot(df['instrumentalness'])
plt.title('Instrumentalness')
plt.subplot(3,3,5)
plt.boxplot(df['liveness'])
plt.title('Liveness')
plt.subplot(3,3,6)
plt.boxplot(df['loudness'])
plt.title('Loudness')
plt.subplot(3,3,7)
plt.boxplot(df['speechiness'])
plt.title('Speechiness')
plt.subplot(3,3,8)
plt.boxplot(df['tempo'])
plt.title('Tempo')
plt.subplot(3,3,9)
plt.boxplot(df['valence'])
plt.title('Valence')
plt.show()

source.802f6716:
fig=plt.figure(figsize=(10,6))

sns.distplot(df.loc[df['target']==1]['acousticness'],kde_kws={'label':'Favourites'}, color='seagreen')
sns.distplot(df.loc[df['target']==0]['acousticness'],kde_kws={'label':'Others'}, color='orange')

plt.title('The Distribution of Acousticness', fontsize = 14)

fig.legend(labels=['Favourites','Others'])

source.142dd18c:
The Spotify Song Attributes data have been collected from Kaggle (https://www.kaggle.com/geomack/spotifyclassification). The dataset contains the Spotify music history of a user (Mr X) in 2017. Different characteristic measures of the songs have been presented in the database along with the song title and artist name. The attributes of the dataset are following -

- **acousticness:** The acoustic measure the track with values between 0.0 (low confidence) and 1.0 (high confidence).

- **Danceability:** The danceability measure of the track has values between 0.0 and 1.0.

- **Duration_ms:** The duration of the track in milliseconds.

- **Energy:** The energy measure of the track has values from 0.0 to 1.0.

- **Instrumentalness:** The instrumental measure of the track has values from 0.0 to 1.0.

- **Key:** The key of the track.

- **Liveness:** The probability of liveness for the track having values between 0.0 and 1.0.

- **Loudness:** The loudness measure of the track has values between -60 and 0 dB.

- **mode:** The modality (major or minor) of a track having values from 0 (Minor) to 1 (Major).

- **Speechiness:** The probability of speech existence in the track.

- **Tempo:** The tempo of a track in beats per minute (BPM).

- **Time_signature:** The time signature of a track.

- **valence:** The probability of musical positiveness from the track having values between 0.0 and 1.0.

- **Target:** Target values for the track - 0 (Others) and 1 (Favourites).

- **Song_Title:** The title of the song.

- **Artist:** The artist of the song.
